prompt:
Please describe a time when you faced an unexpected situation at work and how you handled it.
I once received an important email from the boss asking me to immediately prepare a PowerPoint presentation for a high-level meeting. However, I had no time to gather data or create slides on such short notice. Instead, I quickly researched using Google Slides and created an outline on the spot that covered all the main points and visualized the key ideas. I then added some images to spice things up a bit.
